Arthas.name: Death Coil
Arthas.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage to target enemy.  Can be self-cast to heal for 262 (+4% per level) Health.

Arthas.name: Howling Blast
Arthas.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds and deals 68 (+4% per level) damage.

Arthas.name: Frozen Tempest
Arthas.description: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies and Slow their Movement Speed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed Slowed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%. Frozen Tempest's effects last for 1.5 seconds.

Arthas.name: Army of the Dead
Arthas.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

Arthas.name: Summon Sindragosa
Arthas.description: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

Arthas.name: Frostmourne Hungers
Arthas.description: Activate to make Arthas's next Basic Attack strike immediately, do 99 (+4% per level) increased damage, and restore 30 Mana.

1.name: Eternal Hunger
1.description: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero.  Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

1.name: Frost Presence
1.description: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast.  Reward: After rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.  Reward: After rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also roots enemies in its path.

1.name: Rime
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

4.name: Frozen Wastes
4.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest.  Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

4.name: Icy Talons
4.description: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

4.name: Deathlord
4.description: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.

7.name: Rune Tap
7.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 4% of his max Health.

7.name: Immortal Coil
7.description: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

7.name: Icebound Fortitude
7.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Army of the Dead
10.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Summon Sindragosa
10.description: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

13.name: Shattered Armor
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Frost Strike
13.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Biting Cold
13.description: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.

16.name: Remorseless Winter
16.description: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are rooted for 1.25 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.

16.name: Frostmourne Feeds
16.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

16.name: Embrace Death
16.description: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

20.name: Legion of Northrend
20.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created.  Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

20.name: Absolute Zero
20.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far.  Enemy Heroes are rooted for 2 seconds, and then slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

20.name: Death's Advance
20.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.

20.name: Anti-Magic Shell
20.description: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.
